name: Like a normal fish
description:
A game made for the Godot Wild Jam #41 !
Have you ever tried being a crab in a world tailor made for fishes ? Well, do your best, and may the best fish win !
Musics from Rrrrrose Azerty https://loyaltyfreakmusic.com/music/incredible-kart-game/

It seems the contrast and hue modification options sometime make the UI disappear, so if you don't need it you should not use it ^^

Accessibility 

Sound :
all the sounds are subtitled. The musics are not described yet

Mobility :
It can be played with one hand, either right (arrow keys and shift for actions) or left (WASD or ZQSD and space or E for actions)
You have to be able to hold a key for a long time. I will add a setting to make it optional after the end of the voting period of the jam

Vision :
The font is a dyslexic friendly font.
You can augment the contrast or change the global hue of the game

Trigger warnings :
Ableism
